protection.title: Intellectual Property Protection Demo
protection.description: This page demonstrates the multi-layered IP protection measures implemented in Digital Garden AI, including image protection, content protection, and access logging.

imageProtection.title: Image Protection
imageProtection.description: Prevent malicious downloading and theft of images

contentProtection.title: Content Protection
contentProtection.description: Prevent bulk copying of tutorial content

accessMonitoring.title: Access Monitoring
accessMonitoring.description: Real-time recording and analysis of access behavior

imageDemo.title: Image Protection Demo
imageDemo.testInstructions: Try right-clicking on the image below, dragging to save, or selecting the image. You'll find these operations are disabled. The image also has a dynamic watermark to prevent theft.
imageDemo.normalImageNote: This image has no protection measures and can be right-clicked and saved normally

contentDemo.title: Content Protection Demo
contentDemo.testInstructions: The content area below has protection measures enabled. Try selecting text, copying content, or using developer tools - you'll find these operations are restricted.
contentDemo.contentDescription: This is a demonstration technical tutorial snippet showcasing content protection features
contentDemo.tutorialIntro: In modern web development, performance optimization is crucial. Next.js provides multiple built-in optimization features, including automatic code splitting, image optimization, static generation, and more. Here are some practical optimization tips:

tutorialSections.title: 1. Image Optimization
tutorialSections.content: Using Next.js Image component automatically optimizes image formats, sizes, and loading methods. It supports lazy loading, responsive images, and modern format conversion.

tutorialSections.title: 2. Code Splitting
tutorialSections.content: Next.js automatically performs code splitting, ensuring each page only loads necessary code. You can also use dynamic imports to further optimize bundle size.

tutorialSections.title: 3. Static Generation
tutorialSections.content: For content that doesn't change frequently, using Static Site Generation (SSG) can significantly improve page loading speed. Combined with Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR), you can update content while maintaining performance.

protection.learnMoreDescription: View the complete terms of use and copyright policy to understand your rights and obligations

terms.title: Terms of Use & Copyright Notice
terms.subtitle: Content Usage Guidelines & Intellectual Property Protection Policy

copyright.title: Copyright Notice
copyright.notice: All content on this site (including but not limited to photography works, technical tutorials, articles, code examples) is original content protected by the Copyright Law of the People's Republic of China and relevant international copyright laws.

photography.title: Photography Usage Guidelines
allowedItems: Academic research and educational use (with authorization)
prohibitedItems: Claiming as your own original work
Use for AI model training (without explicit authorization)

tutorials.title: Technical Tutorial Usage Guidelines
encouragedItems: Learning and practicing techniques from tutorials
Applying relevant code in projects (with attribution)
prohibitedItems: Complete copying of tutorial content to other platforms
Malicious distribution or tampering with content

authorization.title: Authorization Request
authorization.description: If you need to use content from this site for the following purposes, please contact us in advance for authorization:
purposes: Commercial use (including but not limited to advertising, marketing, product display)
authorization.contactNote: Please detail the purpose, scope, and duration of use in your email

technicalProtection.title: Technical Protection Measures
technicalProtection.notice: This site has implemented multiple technical protection measures, including but not limited to anti-hotlinking, access logging, content protection, etc. Any attempt to bypass these protection measures may violate relevant laws and regulations.

legalResponsibility.title: Legal Responsibility
legalResponsibility.description: Violations of these terms of use may result in the following legal consequences:
consequences: Criminal prosecution if constituting a crime
legalResponsibility.rights: This site reserves the right to protect its legitimate rights and interests through legal means.

terms.lastUpdated: These terms of use were last updated on:
terms.updateNotice: This site reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Modified terms will be published on the website

photo.title: Image Copyright Notice
photo.content: All photography works on this site are original content protected by copyright law. Unauthorized downloading, copying, reproduction, or commercial use is prohibited. Please contact the author for authorization if needed.

tutorial.title: Content Copyright Notice
tutorial.content: This tutorial content is original technical sharing protected by copyright law. Learning and discussion are welcome, but unauthorized reproduction, copying, or commercial use is prohibited. Please cite the source when referencing.
tutorial.minimal: © Original tutorial content, learning welcome, commercial use prohibited
